title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI in audit is presented as a current, practical toolset that supports repetitive tasks, large-scale data analysis and better decision-making. The podcast outlines specific KPMG tools (AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI, KPMG Clara and Clara for Clients), the shift from sampling to full-population analysis, changing auditor competencies, and implementation challenges including data security and regulatory concerns.
bullets: Practical AI tools discussed: AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI (conversational assistant/agents), KPMG Clara and Clara for Clients.
Shift from traditional sampling to analysis of full populations for more comprehensive audit coverage.
AI supports documentation, disclosure analysis and real-time audit management.
Auditor roles and required competencies are evolving; adaptation and training are needed.
Key implementation challenges: data security, regulatory environment and potential AI-related risks.
takeaways: Prepare and maintain comprehensive, well-structured datasets—AI-enabled audits rely on full-population analysis for accuracy and speed.
Prioritize robust data security and compliance controls, as AI-driven audit processes increase regulatory and privacy focus.
Streamline secure, real-time communication channels with auditors (e.g., client platforms) to accelerate audit workflows.
Invest in staff skills for working with AI-enabled audit tools (data extraction, documentation support, interpretation of outputs).

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Copilot provides real-time visual support for home projects and repairs. It can see what you see and deliver clear, step-by-step instructions for issues like leaky pipes and overflowing washing machines.
bullets: Real-time visual assistance that interprets what the user sees.
Step-by-step instructions for common home repairs.
Targets everyday problems (e.g., leaky pipes, overflowing washers).
Designed to give clear, actionable guidance to users.
Intended for on-the-spot troubleshooting and DIY help.
takeaways: Visual, real-time guidance could enable faster remote troubleshooting for field technicians.
Step-by-step instructions may reduce the need for specialist site visits, lowering operational costs.
Clear on-device guidance can shorten repair times and reduce equipment downtime.
Consider evaluating visual-assist tools to augment training and remote support workflows.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the trailer highlights support for NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG in which you play the Endministrator of Endfield Industries exploring Talos-II; the footage was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra with DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Official launch trailer announces Arknights: Endfield with NVIDIA DLSS 4 (Multi Frame Generation).
Game type: 3D real-time strategy RPG; player role: Endministrator on Talos-II.
Trailer capture details: GeForce RTX 5080, 4K Ultra Settings, DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
Links provided for DLSS 4 announcement, the game site, and multiple social channels.
Hashtags: #ArknightsEndfield #RTXOn #DLSS4
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is being used in a commercial game release—consider GPU support for DLSS 4 when planning high-resolution graphics workloads or demos.
Footage was captured on an RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra, indicating new-generation NVIDIA RTX 50-series hardware may be relevant for 4K capture and rendering pipelines.
For deployments requiring high-fidelity, high-frame-rate capture or streaming, verify compatibility with DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation and appropriate drivers/software.
Include support for developer and community links (game site, social channels) when coordinating previews, benchmarks, or partner showcases.

items.title: I Travel The World And Live Rent-Free By Pet Sitting Full Time

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach who lives rent-free in Portland, Oregon by pet sitting full time and has been traveling light out of two suitcases for the last 18 months. She brings in about $60,000 a year, and the profile is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
bullets: Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach.
Lives rent-free in Portland, Oregon by pet sitting full time.
Has spent the past 18 months living out of two suitcases.
Earns approximately $60,000 per year from this arrangement.
This story is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
takeaways: Based on the description, workforce mobility and nontraditional living arrangements may shift where and how people use residential energy.
Decision-makers should consider that more rent-free or mobile lifestyles could alter local demand patterns versus traditional housing occupancy assumptions.
Profiles like this highlight the importance of adaptable services and infrastructure to support a more transient population.

items.title: New CO2 Battery Stores 8 Hours of Energy

ai.summary: Based on the available description, a new battery concept uses a giant bubble of carbon dioxide to store energy, offering about eight hours of discharge and a capacity of 20 megawatts. The description presents this approach as a way to smooth fluctuating renewable generation and help power the global shift to clean energy.
bullets: Battery stores energy in a giant bubble of carbon dioxide.
Reported capacity: 20 megawatts.
Reported duration: approximately 8 hours of energy storage.
Designed to address fluctuations in renewable energy supply.
Aimed at supporting a global transition to clean energy.
takeaways: Delivers ~20 MW for ~8 hours — potentially useful for multi-hour firming or backup needs.
Can help smooth renewable generation variability and reduce reliance on fossil backup.
Match capacity/duration against site load profiles to assess suitability for grid or data-center use.
Consider integration and operational planning to leverage the technology for decarbonization goals.
